Language_Content_ISO639-3.desc: Content language is the language included in your data (spoken and/or written). Insert the 3-letter ISO 639-3 code for your language, and the standard name of the language as spelt in the ethnologue entry [search on www.ethnologue.com/site_search.asp]. Separate the code and the language with a hyphen, e.g. "ilo - Ilocano"
